original_definition: 'FCR full activation frequency deviation' means the rated value of frequency deviation at which the FCR in a synchronous area is fully activated;
generated_definition: 'FCR full activation frequency deviation' means the amount of deviation from the intended frequency of a signal, system, or process.

Article 3: ‘FCR full activation frequency deviation’ means the rated value of frequency deviation at which the FCR in a synchronous area is fully activated;
